seo.title: Cinque Terre Apartments 2025 | Vacation Rentals & Self-Catering
seo.description: Find the perfect vacation apartment in Cinque Terre. Self-catering rentals, sea-view apartments, and authentic village stays for families and groups.

body.title: Vacation Apartments in Cinque Terre
body.subtitle: Comfortable self-catering apartments with kitchens, terraces, and authentic village living for families and longer stays

features.title: Like a Local
features.description: Live in historic buildings, shop at village markets, and experience authentic daily life in Cinque Terre

features.title: Full Kitchens
features.description: Cook with local ingredients, save on dining costs, and enjoy flexibility for families with children

features.title: Space for Groups
features.description: More room and better value for families, friends, and groups compared to multiple hotel rooms

features.title: Private Terraces
features.description: Many apartments feature balconies or terraces with stunning sea or village views

features.title: Weekly Stays
features.description: Better rates for week-long rentals, ideal for slower-paced exploration of the region

features.title: Local Hosts
features.description: Personal recommendations and insider tips from apartment owners who know the area

body.title: Compare All Accommodation Options
body.description: Explore hotels, agriturismi, camping, and more for your perfect Cinque Terre stay
